channel.title: Git Hub on John, Complected

item.title: Deploy Hugo With Github
item.description: Okay so I heartily believe in DevOps and also I just wanted to try somthing now that I’ve been playing with hugo. So I decided to deploy my rendered site out automatically when I commit changes to the main branch. Now while I do love the open source community I didn’t want to share my draft posts and other content before I was ready, so I have a private repo with my hugo site definition.
